bibl.title: The oikoi and Civic Government in Egypt in the Fifth and Sixth Centuries.
bibl.note: The main focus of this article is what one might call the 'private' oikoi.

bibl.title: with the assistance of C.G. WILLIAMSON, Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age.

bibl.seg: TUCK James, The oikoi and Civic Government in Egypt in the Fifth and Sixth Centuries.

Onno M. VAN NIJF and Richard ALSTON (Edd.), with the assistance of C.G. WILLIAMSON, Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age = Groningen - Royal Holloway Studies on the Greek City after the Classical Age. 2 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2011) pp. 287-305.
The main focus of this article is what one might call the 'private' oikoi.
